name: Pink Suffering
description: in this game you are a ball that is being attacked by these smaller pink balls. there are three levels. to beat a level you have to survive a certain amount of time that varies through the levels and when the time ends, a flag will drop down and you have to touch it to move on to the next level. in order to kill the pink balls you have to shove them of the edge of the stage. well that's al i have to say about the game
